casebody.data:
NC Department of Transportation
v.
Mission Battleground Park, DST, et al. 361PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Bruce P. Ashley, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, Matthew Nis Leerberg, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Patrick M. Kane, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for Mission Battleground Park, DST, et al. Hilda Burnett-Baker, Special Deputy Attorney General, Phyllis A. Turner, Assistant Attorney General, for NC Department of Transportation.

Patrick M. Kane, Greensboro.

Garth Dunklin, Attorney at Law, for James F. Collins

The following order has been entered on the conditional motion filed on the 15th of November 2016 by James F. Collins for leave to file Amicus Curiae Brief:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."

Unless already submitted, the Amicus Brief shall be submitted to the court within *212the times allowed and in the manner provided by Appellate Rule 28(i).
